casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles N. CARSON. No. 609P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2007 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
